Package com.defano.jmonet.tools.base

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BoundsToolDelegate
    A delegate class responsible for rendering the shape drawn by a BoundsTool.
    LinearToolDelegate
    A delegate class responsible for rendering shapes drawn by the LinearTool.
    PathToolDelegate
    A delegate class responsible for rendering shapes drawn by the PathToolDelegate.
    PolylineToolDelegate
    A delegate class responsible for rendering shapes drawn by the PolylineTool.
    SelectionToolDelegate
    A delegate class responsible for rendering selections drawn by the SelectionTool.
    Tool  
    TransformToolDelegate
    A delegate responsible for handling changes made to the transformed selection frame.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicTool<DelegateType>
    A base tool class providing configuration-specific attributes (like stroke and fill), activation state management (which canvas the tool is active on, if any) and a reference to the tool's delegate.
    BoundsTool
    A tool that draws shapes by defined by a bounding box, like rectangles, round-rectangles, and ovals.
    LinearTool
    A tool for drawing shapes defined by two points on the canvas, like lines.
    PathTool
    A tool for drawing shapes defined by an arbitrary path (series of points) drawn on the canvas, like a paintbrush, eraser, or pencil.
    PolylineTool
    A tool that draws shapes defined by a series of interconnected lines, where the end of the current line denotes the starting point of the next line.
    SelectionTool
    A complex tool that draws a bounding shape (typically a rectangle, but may be any closed shape) and provides the ability to pick up and move or transform the pixels bound by the selection shape.
    StrokedCursorPathTool
    A PathTool whose mouse cursor tracks the tool's stroke and paint, like the paintbrush tool.
    TransformTool
    A SelectionTool whose rectanglular selection frame can be modified by dragging handles that are rendered by the tool at each corner of the frame's bounds.
